ComicInfo.Summary: In this specially priced issue, the Pentagon is forced to reassess their tenuous relationship with Commander Adam Archer. Is he an all-American hero or a threat to humanity? It¹s a journey through the GØDLAND saga so far, with an outcome you won¹t believe! The proverbial jumping on point for new readers. Yeah, yeah, yeah we know you¹ve heard it a thousand times, but this time IT¹S TRUE! Affordable and informative what more could anyone want from the ultimate Cosmic Superhero Epic?!
